name: Geotanical
description:
A grassy world and an earthy world have unexpectedly combined. 

Despite the chaos, these worlds seem to be quite similar. 

In fact, a slime has discovered a way to harness both world's powers.

You have 3 lives.

CONTROLS

A (or <-) - Move Left

D (or ->) - Move right

Escape - exit game

Space - Jump

Control - Change form

3RD PARTY ASSETS

Grass tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/grass-tiles-0 (Invincible)

Rock tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/ground-tiles-2 (Raijin)

Lava/Mud/Waste/Fusion Fluid: https://pngall.com/lava-png/download/29752

Made in Unity

Original assets made in Piskel and Sketchpad 5.1.
